Text: Jmanwf my friend thanks a lot for this episode and for all of the uploads of this weeks episodes.Awesome job like always..I hope for some reason u will not stop to upload days because u are the only one who uploads it and we will lose our favorite soap..So keep up the great work and keep them roling.Cheers.:-)
keep up the great work keeps me watching at work and not having to watch on vcr at home.
